thread.title: Martha Zayko
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Martha Zayko

author: Martha Zayko
title: Martha Zayko
text: We had been shopping on line for tires and even had a Quote: from another major tire dealer in the area. I compared the same tire at Town Fair and found it for $30 less. We purchased four tires and had them installed within 2 hours. Could not be happier...service was wonderful and no high pressure sales.
